users.selectList: select username as poster, userid as href from users;
users.count: select count(userid) as count from users;
users.insert: insert into users (username, password, emailid) values ($1::text, $2::text, $3::text);
users.update: update users set username = $1::text, password = $2::text, emailid = $3::text where userid = $4;

rolepermissions.selectList: select role as poster, id as href from rolepermissions;
rolepermissions.count: select count(id) as count from rolepermissions;
rolepermissions.update: update rolepermissions set role = $1::text, permissions = $2 where id = $3;

crops.selectList: select cropname as poster, crops_cropid as href from crops;
crops.count: select count(crops_cropid) as count from crops;
crops.update: update crops set crops_cropname = $1::text where crops_cropid = $2;

dailyharvest.selectList: select harvestname as poster, dailyharvest_harvestid as href from dailyharvest;
dailyharvest.count: select count(dailyharvest_harvestid) as count from dailyharvest;
dailyharvest.selectItem: select * from dailyharvest where dailyharvest_harvestid = $1 join crops on crops.crops_cropid = dailyharvest.dailyharvest_cropid;
dailyharvest.update: update dailyharvest set dailyharvest_harvestname = $1::text, dailyharvest_cropid = $2 where dailyharvest_harvestid = $3;

sorting.selectList: select sortname as poster, sorting_sortingid as href from sorting;
sorting.count: select count(sorting_sortingid) as count from sorting;
sorting.selectItem: select * from sorting where sorting_sortingid = $1 join dailyharvest on dailyharvest.dailyharvest_harvestid = sorting.sorting_harvestid;
sorting.update: update sorting set sorting_sortname = $1::text, sorting_harvestid = $2 where sorting_sortingid = $3;
